export.name: Wago.io Enhancement Shaman
export.description: Comprehensive WeakAuras package for Enhancement Shaman from Wago.io community
export.setupInstructions:
1. Install WeakAuras addon from CurseForge
2. Visit the external link to Wago.io
3. Browse or search for your class/spec WeakAuras
4. Copy the import string from Wago.io
5. Type `/wa` in-game and click 'Import'
6. Paste the string and configure as needed
